sentences.sContent: The new cancer treatment was pioneered in the early eighties by Dr Sylvia Bannerjee.
sentences.sCn: 这种新的癌症治疗方法是由西尔维娅·班纳基医生在80年代初期开创的。

sentences.sContent: ...one of the leading pioneers of photojournalism.
sentences.sCn: …摄影新闻界的主要先驱之一。

trans.tranOther: to be the first person to do, invent or use something
Someone who is referred to as a pioneer in a particular area of activity is one of the first people to be involved in it and develop it
